section.heading: General agents, agents, or solicitors; issuance, expiration and renewal of required license; exceptions; termination of employment; information provided Superintendent deemed privileged

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 11-268, § 10(i) ( 44 DCR 1730), effective May 21, 1997, amends the repealed sections subsequent to repeal.
